award_title: SaTC: CORE: Medium: Robust Machine Learning at the Edge
subject: Making your ML work accessible beyond the paper
body:
Hi Stratis,

I came across your NSF work on robust ML for edge devices â€“ it's exactly the kind of research that should be easy for others to actually use and build on, especially when you're reporting on broader impacts.

I'm building Ouro, a platform for sharing computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable, not just a zip file in supplementary materials.

Figured it might be helpful for making your work more accessible and demonstrating real-world use in grant reports.

Any interest in trying it out?

Best
